item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Documenting an 1115 ft radio tower climb (104 points | 29 comments)

15. The day I taught AI to read code like a Senior Developer (321 points | 169 comments)

20. Combining 15s interval whole-sky-camera photos to form a 4y spanning keogram (491 points | 76 comments)

27. ELKS: Linux for 16-bit Intel Processors (194 points | 99 comments)
28. Sailor Poets Take over U.S. Navy Deck Logs on New Year's Day (66 points | 12 comments)
29. Blur Busters Open Source Display Initiative – Refresh Cycle Shaders (73 points | 31 comments)
